reviews.review_msg: Really interesting course, Dr Torabi explains material very well, she knows what she is doing, really helpful at the office hours. great TAs. Recommend it to everyone. If you just read her lectures you dont even need to look at the txtbook.

One of the greatest proff ever seen. do you self a favor and take the course with him. attend all lectures and do all the assignments. very helpful at her office hour. The only problem is that she takes it easy on you so you might have a hard time for ENSC 250 and 350
She is great prof... But You need to go all the lecture because all quizs, midterms and final are from her lecture notes. She is hot
yo Liila ... U r a good teacher i msut say :))Hope to see u again for the future engineering courses :))
Quiz and midterm is easy to get high mark as long as u go to class and take notes. Her tests is all about the notes especially the quiz. We can use book or notes whatever is ours during the quiz.
Great prof, only recently started teaching. Sometimes hard to understand, she's not a native English speaker, and has some messed up grammar, but she'll always explain stuff until you get it.
